OperandÂ¶

struct asmjit::Operand
#include <defs.h>

Operand can contain register, memory location, immediate, or label.

Public Functions

Operand()

Create an uninitialized operand.

Operand(const Operand & other)

Create a reference to other operand.

Operand(const _NoInit &)

Operand clone()

Clone Operand.

void _init(const Operand & other)

void _init_packed_op_sz_b0_b1_id(uint32_t op, uint32_t sz, uint32_t r0, uint32_t r1, uint32_t id)

void _init_packed_op_sz_w0_id(uint32_t op, uint32_t sz, uint32_t w0, uint32_t id)

void _init_packed_d0_d1(uint32_t u0, uint32_t u1)

void _init_packed_d2_d3(uint32_t u2, uint32_t u3)

void _copy(const Operand & other)

template < typename T >
T & getData()

template < typename T >
const T & getData()

uint32_t getOp()

Get type of the operand, see kOperandType.

bool isNone()

Get whether the operand is none (kOperandTypeNone).

bool isReg()

Get whether the operand is any register (kOperandTypeReg).

bool isVar()

Get whether the operand is variable (kOperandTypeVar).

bool isMem()

Get whether the operand is memory address (kOperandTypeMem).

bool isImm()

Get whether the operand is an immediate value (kOperandTypeImm).

bool isLabel()

Get whether the operand is label (kOperandTypeLabel).

bool isRegType(uint32_t type)

Get whether the operand is register of type.

bool isRegCode(uint32_t type, uint32_t index)

Get whether the operand is register and of type and index.

bool isRegOrMem()

Get whether the operand is a register or memory.

bool isVarOrMem()

Get whether the operand is variable or memory.

uint32_t getSize()

Get size of the operand in bytes.

uint32_t getId()

Get operand id (Operand id’s are used internally by BaseAssembler and BaseCompiler classes).

Note
There is no way how to change or remove operand id. If you don’t need the operand just assign different operand to this one.

Public Members

BaseOp _base

Base data.

VRegOp _vreg

Register or variable data.

VMemOp _vmem

Memory data.

ImmOp _imm

Immediate data.

LabelOp _label

Label data.

UInt64 _packed[2]

Packed operand as two 64-bit integers.

union asmjit::Operand::@16 @17

class BaseOp

Public Members

uint8_t op

Type of operand, see kOperandType.

uint8_t size

Size of operand (register, address, immediate, or variable).

uint8_t reserved0

Flags, each operand uses this byte for something else.

uint8_t reserved1

Reserved (not used).

uint32_t id

Operand id (private variable for BaseAssembler and BaseCompiler classes).

Note
Uninitialized operand has always set id to kInvalidValue.

class ImmOp

Public Members

uint8_t op

Type of operand, kOperandTypeImm.

uint8_t size

Size of immediate (or 0 to autodetect).

uint8_t reserved0

Reserved (not used).

uint8_t reserved1

Reserved (not used).

uint32_t id

Operand id (kInvalidValue).

int8_t _i8[8]

8x signed 8-bit immediate values.

uint8_t _u8[8]

8x unsigned 8-bit immediate values.

int16_t _i16[4]

4x signed 16-bit immediate values.

uint16_t _u16[4]

4x unsigned 16-bit immediate values.

int32_t _i32[2]

2x signed 32-bit immediate values.

uint32_t _u32[2]

2x unsigned 32-bit immediate values.

int64_t _i64[1]

1x signed 64-bit immediate value.

uint64_t _u64[1]

1x unsigned 64-bit immediate value.

float _f32[2]

2x SP-FP values.

double _f64[1]

1x DP-FP value.

union asmjit::Operand::ImmOp::@22 value

class LabelOp

Public Members

uint8_t op

Type of operand, kOperandTypeLabel.

uint8_t size

Reserved (not used).

uint8_t reserved0

Reserved (not used).

uint8_t reserved1

Reserved (not used).

uint32_t id

Operand id.

class VMemOp

Public Members

uint8_t op

Type of operand, kOperandTypeMem.

uint8_t size

Size of the pointer in bytes.

uint8_t type

Type of the memory operand, see kMemType.

uint8_t flags

X86/X64 layout:

uint32_t base

Base register, variable or label id.

uint32_t index

Index register or variable.

int32_t displacement

32-bit displacement or absolute address.

class VRegOp

Public Members

uint8_t op

Type of operand, kOperandTypeReg.

uint8_t size

Size of register or variable.

uint16_t code

Register code = (type << 8) | index.

uint8_t type

Register type.

uint8_t index

Register index.

union asmjit::Operand::VRegOp::@18 @19

uint32_t id

Variable id (used by BaseCompiler to identify variables).

uint32_t vType

Variable type.

uint32_t vUnused
